import { Component} from '@angular/core'; import { Router} from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent { collapsed = true; goToPart(fragment:any){ this.router.navugateByUrl(fragment) } }
